thread.title: The D.I.Y. Revolutionaries of the Pussyhat Project
thread.title_full: The D.I.Y. Revolutionaries of the Pussyhat Project

author: Rob Walker
title: The D.I.Y. Revolutionaries of the Pussyhat Project
text:
The Women’s Marches in Washington, D.C. , and elsewhere this weekend elicited a response from Michael Cohen, the famously combative lawyer for the Trump Organization, and now for Trump personally, who claimed to be “impressed” by the sheer visual spectacle. But his Twitter musing to that effect came with a tweak at the protesters: “Question: Were the pink hats made in the USA?”
See the rest of the story at newyorker.com 
Related:
Drawing the Women’s March and the Way Forward 
Megyn Kelly, the Glittering Aberration 
The Bot Politic
